transport.question: I go 'choo choo'! What am I?

hints.text: 🚂 I run on tracks
💨 I can carry lots of people
⚙️ I have a whistle

transport.question: I go 'vroom vroom' and take you places. What am I?

hints.text: 🚦 I have wheels and an engine
🛣️ I drive on roads
👪 You can go on a trip in me

transport.question: I float on the water and take people on a ride. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I need water to move
⚓️ I have sails, or a motor
⛴️ I am bigger than a canoe

transport.question: I have two wheels and you pedal to make me go. What am I?

hints.text: 🚴 I need you to push the pedals
🔔 I might have a bell
🧑‍🦽 I don't have a motor

transport.question: I fly in the sky and take people far away. What am I?

hints.text: ✈️ I have wings
☁️ I fly above the clouds
🌍 I can take you to another country

transport.question: I am like a car, but I carry many people at once. What am I?

hints.text: 🚍 I stop to let people on and off
🛑 I follow a route
👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 Many people can ride inside me

transport.question: I carry lots of things, but not people, and I have a big bed in the back. What am I?

hints.text: 📦 I carry goods
🛻 I am often used for work
🧱 I can carry building materials

transport.question: I help people who are sick or hurt, and I have a loud siren. What am I?

hints.text: 🚨 I have flashing lights
🚑 I take people to the hospital
🩺 I have medical equipment inside

transport.question: I go very fast and can take people into space. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 I am very powerful
👩‍🚀 Astronauts ride in me
🌌 I travel to the stars

transport.question: I am a special kind of train that goes under the city. What am I?

hints.text: 🚇 I run in tunnels
🏙️ You can find me in big cities
📍I stop at stations beneath the ground

animal.question: I quack and waddle. I like to swim in a puddle. Who am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am yellow when I'm little
🌾 I eat seeds
🦢 I look like a swan but much smaller

animal.question: I say 'Moo!' and give you milk. Who am I?

hints.text: 🖤 I am often black and white
🌱 I eat grass in a field
🔔 I might have a bell on my neck

animal.question: I meow and purr. I like to chase string and fur. Who am I?

hints.text: 🧶 I like to play with yarn
🥛 I drink milk from a bowl
🐈 I love to nap in sunbeams

animal.question: I bark and wag my tail. I love to play and fetch. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I like to chew on bones
🎾 I enjoy playing fetch
🏡 I protect your house

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. I eat plants and trumpet loudly. Who am I?

hints.text: 🌍 I live in Africa and Asia
🚿 I use my trunk to spray water
🐘 I am the biggest land animal

animal.question: I hop and have long ears. I love to eat carrots. Who am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I love to eat this orange vegetable
🌱 I eat green things too
🐰 I am a small and fuzzy mammal

animal.question: I roar loudly and have a mane. I am the king of the jungle. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦁 Only the boys have a mane
🥩 I eat meat
🐾 I am a very big cat

animal.question: I swing from trees and love bananas. I make funny faces. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐒 Some types have a very long tail
🌴 I live in a hot place
🍌 I peel my favorite snack

animal.question: I swim in the sea and have lots of teeth. People are scared of me. Who am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I swim in the ocean
🦈 I am a type of fish
🦷 People are scared of my bite

animal.question: I slither on the ground and sometimes hiss. I shed my skin. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐍 I am a reptile
🥚 I hatch from an egg
🌿 I can be many different colours
